title: Bug 17423: Revert appears twice in the popup menu.
description: There are two Revert options in the menu.
OB: There are duplicate entries for the Revert option in the popup menu.
SR:
To reproduce: 
 1) Open a Java editor in Build F1. 
 2) Popup the menu. The Revert option appears twice, once after UNDO and the other before FORMAT.
